page.title: 02HIGH HURSTWOOD RESIDENTS
page.content: Since no new houses are allowed to be built in the area, those which are already here are very much in demand. They come onto the market rarely and fetch high prices. This puts them out of the range of young families or first time buyers and an ageing of the population has been noted in recent years. A survey of residents showed that most of them enjoy their surroundings. Hardly any of the adults had lived here all their lives but the picture is of a settled community who have sought and found a home they really like and intend to stay. It is a popular place for retirement though the elderly are apprehensive that they may not be able to continue to live here once they can no longer drive.
